Title: Authorizes the Seagate police department receive a special parking placard
Summary: Authorizes the Seagate police department receive a special parking placard for the department's motor vehicles when such officers are on official business as peace officers.
LawCode: Amd ยง1203, add ยง404-ff, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to parking regulations for the Seagate police department
